features: Slim fit sits close to the body, with room for the garment to move with you
Low-bulk Thermolite®(60g)insulation uses 40% recycled material to trap warm air and features a larger surface area to boost moisture evaporation
Dryride Mist-Defy DWR fabric repels water while staying soft, stretchy, and comfortable
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
Attached hood with stretch binding at opening
Drop hem for extended length and added coverage
Zippered chest pocket, zippered microfleece hand-warmer pockets, and removable bag with sling attachment
